data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of PSG.
In the minute 2, Free kick for PSG in the half of Nantes.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Nantes to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards PSG a goal kick.
PSG are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 12, Pablo Sarabia (PSG) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Danilo Pereira (PSG) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 13, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
Moses Simon for Nantes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 16, PSG have a goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, The match at Stade de la Beaujoire has been interrupted briefly for a check on Moses Simon, who is down injured.
Nantes's Moses Simon is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 21, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a PSG throw-in in Nantes's half.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Abdoul Kader Bamba (Nantes) has replaced the possibly injured Moses Simon at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 26, PSG are coming forward and Kylian Mbappe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of PSG.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a PSG throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 31, PSG to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Free kick PSG.
Ludovic Blas (Nantes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 33, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside PSG's half?
In the minute 36, Nantes are pushing forward but Randal Kolo Muani's finish is wide of the goal.
PSG have a goal kick.
In Nantes, PSG push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 38, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
PSG's Kylian Mbappe misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in PSG.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a PSG throw-in in Nantes's half.
Rafinha of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
At Stade de la Beaujoire the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
The first-half has come to a close in Nantes.
Hakim Ben el Hadj has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Kays Ruiz Atil is replacing Moise Kean for the away team.
Ander Herrera is on target to give PSG a 0-1 advantage.
Kylian Mbappe with an assist there.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Nantes, Rafinha of PSG is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 52, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG drives forward and Kylian Mbappe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 55, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 58, PSG's Ander Herrera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Nantes a goal kick.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 61, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
PSG have been given a penalty at Stade de la Beaujoire...
Kylian Mbappe smashes in a penalty at Stade de la Beaujoire. The score is now 0-2.
In the minute 66, Thomas Tuchel (PSG) is making a second substitution, with Marquinhos replacing Idrissa Gueye.
PSG make their third substitution with Thilo Kehrer replacing Danilo Pereira.
Goal kick for PSG at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 67, Marcus Coco is booked for the home team.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, An attacking Nantes player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Important block from the PSG defence as Abdoul Kader Bamba fires in a strike for Nantes.
Abdoul Kader Bamba (Nantes) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 71, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for PSG at Stade de la Beaujoire.
PSG drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Marcus Coco with Jean-Kevin Augustin.
The home team have replaced Pedro Chirivella with Abdoulaye Toure. This is the third substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 74, Layvin Kurzawa is on a sub for Rafinha for PSG.
Bandiougou Fadiga is on a sub for Kylian Mbappe for PSG.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG.
In the minute 76, PSG drive upfield and Pablo Sarabia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
Throw-in Nantes.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Nantes in the half of PSG.
Colin Dagba (PSG) has received a first yellow card.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nantes.
In the minute 84, Free kick Nantes.
Christian Gourcuff is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Beaujoire with Roli Pereira De Sa replacing Ludovic Blas.
PSG are whistled for offside.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
PSG take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Pablo Sarabia.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of PSG.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
PSG will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nantes.
Roli Pereira De Sa (Nantes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nantes are pushing forward but Abdoulaye Toure's finish is wide of the goal.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards PSG a goal kick.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-3.
